title: My name was Changed and I'm not Sure Why
body: My name was changed (I believe; if not please tell me). To 3xHKVsaOGe (I think). I don't know why this happened. Could someone tell me? It just randomly was 3xHVsaOGe one day.

replies.body: It looks like the name was change due to name activity.  I've flagged you for a rename, so you should be able to change it now!
